page.title: 14BRAHAM MILLAR FACTORY 1
page.content: In our 12km. sq. area there is only one factory that is the Braham Millar factory in Strayfied Road which manu- factures machinery for the quarrying and crushing of rocks, sand and gravel The Braham Millar Group comprises four major companies whose activities cover the whole spectrum of plant and equip- ment in the construction and quarrying industries.Established in 1909 the factory was originally cited in the city but when in 1930 Mr. Braham bought Astley House in Strayfield Road he moved his factory up beside it.110 people are now employed there.In the early days raw materials were brought up and the finished product dispatched by horse and cart, but later, as now, by lorry.The factory has two lorries but hires other transport as required. The iron foundry at Braham Millar's Bishops Stortford factory supplies the
